alert.note: Alert for Clark; Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 8:26PM CDT until September 15 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Meade County in southwestern Kansas... Southwestern Clark County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 825 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Meade State Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...A 59 mph wind gust was reported by Kansas mesonet station MEUK1 at 8:16 PM. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Meade and southwestern Clark Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
